section4.title: Inline Inspection Experience
section4.subtitle1: Why is the success rate not 100%?
section4.subtitle2: Many of the pipelines Dexon inspect are “unpiggable pipelines”, “non-standard pipelines” or pipelines that have never been inspected before. This increases the risk of not achieving a successful inspection on the first try. Dexon will however never give up until successful completion has been achieved.
